nodes.text: A fancy resort club was in operation above the gas giant Bespin. At some point, there were some retired air rodeo thrantas located at the club. One day when the club was open, a criminal came to the club, troubled the residents greatly, and left in the last available speeder.
In response to the criminal's actions, a group of individuals speedily pursued the criminal riding the club's thrantas.

The resort club first appeared as part of an adventure idea in "Rodeo Thranta", an article written by Jeff Quick for the Creature Feature series of articles that was published on Wizards of the Coast's website to expand the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. The article was released on December 12, 2002, with the adventure ideas and locations being usable by Game Masters at any time after thrantas were first used in air rodeos, which happened before the destruction of the thrantas' home planet, Alderaan.
